post.author: jonathanm
post.title: New Blog? Sort of....
post.content:
This is  a ASP.NET blog. It too will be replaced by a combination of ASP.NET and Silverlight by December. As far as the old blog I will post only the important stuff in July. things such as..

  • Videos
  • Code Samples

I will keep the old blog so if there is anything you want to know just let me know.
